Package com.example.hoard

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.example.hoard.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Item extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an item with various properties, used in the application for tracking and managing items. This class is serializable, allowing it to be easily passed between activities or saved to persistent storage. Properties: - dateOfAcquisition (Date): The date when the item was acquired. - briefDescription (String): A brief description of the item. - make (String): The make of the item. - model (String): The model of the item. - serialNumber (String): The serial number of the item. - comment (String): Any additional comments about the item. - estimatedValue (double): The estimated monetary value of the item. - itemID (String): A unique identifier for the item. - tags (ArrayList): A list of tags associated with the item. - briefDescriptionList (List): An additional list of brief descriptions, marked for special property name handling in serialization. - isSelected (boolean): A flag indicating if the item is currently selected in the UI.
See Also:
